body.name: HOROW HWMT-8733S Small Toilet 25" Long x 13.4" Wide x 28.4" High 1-Piece Short Compact Bathroom Tiny Mini Commode Water Closet Dual Flush Concealed Trapway, 12'' Rough-in
features: Modern Design: Modern compact one-piece toilet. This toilet is smaller and shorter than a standard toilet, so it perfectly fits small bathrooms. The toilet seat is 2” shorter than a standard elongated toilet seat. It comes with two small bolt holes on the side, more beautiful and sleek.

Space Saver: This toilet is compact one piece toilet in small size smaller and shorter than a standard toilet,so it fits for small bathrooms. Actually, it’s a perfect size unless you’re an extremely large person. It is a wonderful small toilet for water closets.

Siphon-Flushing: Highly efficient dual-flush toilet allows you to proactively conserve water by selecting 1.1 GPF or higher(1.6gpf) for tougher jobs. Dual flush toilet fully glazed flush, Super-quiet, and powerful flush with no clogs.

Easy To Clean: The modern toilet's fully skirted trapway design makes it extremely easy to clean. It can be kept clean for a longer time because of using self-cleaning materials. Compare to other standard toilets, it has no corners and grooves and is very easy to reach for cleaning, not like others hard to reach.

Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose: If your supply line size is 1/2", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is U.S standard 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it. (Supply line must be purchased separately )

Life-Time After-Sales Service: HOROW values each customer’s shopping experience and believes in the quality of our products, therefore our toilets comes with lifetime after-sales service and 1 year limited warranty. Our customer service center will respond to messages within 12 hours.
body.description: HOROW ONE-PIECE SIPHONIC SMALL TOILET DUAL FLUSH Elegant Installation Access Hole Compare to our best-selling small-size toilet (HWMT-8733), this toilet has an elegant installation access hole to configure the bathroom of your dreams. Although designed for small spaces, this toilet looks perfect in every modern bathroom. The seat-lid closes silently. The Dual-Flush feature is ideal for water conservation. PP Toilet Seat and Wax Ring are included to facilitate installation and use. Trapway is concealed from view. Glazed surface is Self-Cleaning, simplifying maintenance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT HOROW Better HOROW, Better Life HOROW ONE-PIECE SIPHONIC SMALL TOILET DUAL FLUSH Elegant Installation Access Hole Compare to our best-selling small-size toilet (HWMT-8733), this toilet has an elegant installation access hole to configure the bathroom of your dreams. Although designed for small spaces, this toilet looks perfect in every modern bathroom. The seat-lid closes silently. The Dual-Flush feature is ideal for water conservation. PP Toilet Seat and Wax Ring are included to facilitate installation and use. Trapway is concealed from view. Glazed surface is Self-Cleaning, simplifying maintenance.

High Quality One-Piece Toilet Features Easy-to-Clean Design Concealed trapway design and Self-clean glaze surface creates a nice look and makes cleaning easier. It comes with two small bolt holes on the side, more beautiful and sleek. Super Quiet & Powerful Flushing Fully glazed flush, bringing a super quiet & powerful flushing - NO clogs, NO leaks. Soft Closing Seat The seat cover descends slowly and quietly. It's firmly after years of use. (P.S.: We upload the video of seat installation.)

About Installation Quick Release Seat Push-button removable seat - quick release, which makes it easy to install. Designed for this small toilet, our easy-release seat features three steps of operating - click, remove, and install, just where you need it, for drive away dirty, no matter when you want to change it. Dual Flush Design Two flush options and both are water saving features. The full flush uses 1.6 gallons of water, while the light flush uses 1.1 gallons (average flush 1.28gpf), which can save even more water without compromising a clean flush that performs as well as other toilets. Super Space Save! Perfectly fit for a small bathroom. 25'' inch Depth from the wall to the end. Space saver. The tiny 1 piece toilet is a good height for Short/Medium people and beatiful human.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Potty people in the house tonight!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this toilet installed for a few days now, and I love it. The dual flush works great, and there have been no clogs or other flush related issues at all. The seat does take a little getting used to as it's not as circular as standard toilet seats are.I will say that customer service was absolutely stellar! The tracking listed the package as on thetruck for delivery for over a week when I finally contacted Horow for help. They promptly replied, looked into the issue and sent out another one right away.Overall I recommend this toilet for smaller spaces as it does provide more room around the sides than a standard size toilet. In addition it takes up much less visual space, and it is in my opinion quite attractive to look at and has a feeling of quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding customer service
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to install and has a sleek easy to clean design. Fits my small bath perfectly! Had a small problem with some hardware and it was handled immediately. Will definitely use this company’s product on future projects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern looking with great flush
reviews.reviewText: The toilet looked sooo small that at first I tried to return it! After realizing we’d have to pay for the return shipping we decided to keep it. So happy we did! After the install the size wasn’t that noticeable and was perfect for our space! The flush is great and no problems with clogging... so far :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very difficult to install
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful modern toilet, works well however the installation was very difficult, it took us days to install as the mounts are not the same shape as the holes in the toilet so they dont fit in. obviously a flaw from factory, so we had to custom make our own mounts. Without these mounts the toilet can still be installed but it would be loose. Something to think about before buying it. Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad lil toilet for the $$$ but....
reviews.reviewText: So the first one i bought off Wayfair ended up being 1/2" to long so I ordered this one and it'll work perfectly. Only a couple of knocks against it one being the toilet seat is very cheesy. Feels like an RV toilet seat but they do now sell a nicer one which i wish woulda been an option. The other is looking at the mounting fingers... They are made of plastic. I havent installed the toilet yet but im gonna make sure the seal is good and warm before install because I think the mounting screws will strip out very easily if you need to torque the toilet down flush. Ill update my review after install this weekend.Update.... Install was a breeze. Left the seal outside for a couple hours so it was really soft, so soft that setting the toilet down it squashed flush to the floor on its own. I guess the plastic brackets are good enough since the seal itself locks the toilet down. After turning on the water i did notice water was leaking somewhere and it ended up being the flush valve was loose on its base so unscrewed it and tightened up the screw on the seal and problem fixed. Nice lil toilet though, very happy so far. 🚽😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The crappiest company I’ve ever seen!
reviews.reviewText: Toilet looks nice but they sent me a toilet with three cracks that were sealed with putty. Water leaked all over the floor. I wish I could have them removed from Amazon because I cannot understand that level of incompetence or lack of to allow a product like that to be shipped out of your inventory. Thankfully I got my money back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE best toilet for small spaces.
reviews.reviewText: We have a tiny bathroom, but this toilet utilizes the space perfectly. It is the perfect combination of function and design. It flushes quickly quietly and easily with two different features while conserving water. Both my big husband and diminutive me find the toilet accommodating and comfortable. Having the seat lower itself gently is a lovely feature. This simple yet charming toilet would work with many decorative styles. I mixed its clean modern lines with funky antique industrial fixtures to great success. Horow has created a contemporary classic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: It wouldn't be fair of me to tell you this is a excellent product as I never had a chance to install the unit. There was a layout issue with fitting the toilet in my bathroom. However, it does appear to measure up to the features in the discripiton.I can say without question that their customer service support is excellent. After encountering my issue they were quick to reply, supportive and made me a happy customer.So if you are considering this toilet and have any doubts know their customer service team are there for you.
